messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/14/2004 11:59:28 AM Eastern Standard Time, ... Northeast Florida---about 45 minutes from Georgia.  How South East are you? Gail [Non-text
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/14/2004 11:59:28 AM Eastern Standard Time,
kbcdlovejo@... writes:

> In a message dated 1/12/2004 11:52:52 PM Eastern Standard Time,
> UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes:
> Oh why cant some of you live close to me! Im in SE GA and I dont know anyone
>
> that unschools! I need a real life person I can talk to sometimes and have
> support with! Sad you dont live close!


Northeast Florida---about 45 minutes from Georgia. How South East are you?

Gail

Oh why cant some of you live close to me! Im in SE GA and I dont know anyone
that unschools! I need a real life person I can talk to sometimes and have
support with! Sad you dont live close! You ladies are great!!!


Columbia, SC. Close enough???

~Kelly
